allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: email system - fix domain mismatch, add logging, resend feature

Root cause fix:
- Change FROM_EMAIL from noreply@starkscholars.com to info@mail.starkscholars.com
- Resend only accepts emails from verified subdomain mail.starkscholars.com

Email logging:
- Add emailLogs table to track all email sends with Resend IDs
- Log success/failure for every email type
- Store error messages for failed emails

Resend email feature:
- Add resendEmail mutation for applicants to resend recommendation requests
- Add adminResendEmail mutation for admin dashboard
- Generate new tokens on resend \(helps with spam issues\)
- Add "Resend Email" button in recommendations-step UI

Admin email dashboard:
- New /admin/emails page showing all email logs
- Filter by type \(recommendation_request, welcome, etc.\) and status
- Search by recipient email
- Stats cards for total/sent/failed/pending
- Resend button for recommendation emails
EOF
\)")
